locales.description: !! NOT YET IMPLEMENTED !! Posts containing an image, no alt-text, and no post text. This is a safety-check to avoid unwanted content that has no means of being labeled/filtered.
locales.name: Image-only post with no alt-txt

locales.description: Post contains links to x.com, aka Twitter.
locales.name: Twitter Link

locales.description: Post contains common keywords associated with pornography. An account gets labeled this if many of its posts get labeled.
locales.name: Porn posts

locales.description: Posts contain terms typical of trolling behavior, such as 'sleepy joe' or 'libtard'. An account gets labeled this if many of its posts get labeled.
locales.name: Trollish posts

locales.description:
Posts containing racial, religious, or other slurs.

An account gets labeled this if many of its posts get labeled.
locales.name: Slurs

locales.description: Posts containing common curse words. An account gets labeled this if many of its posts get labeled.
locales.name: Cursing

locales.description: Posts containing terms typically used as derogatory slurs against the LGBTQIA+ community. An account gets labeled this if many of its posts get labeled.
locales.name: Homophobic Slurs
